Package org.opensextant.giscore.events

Class Comment

java.lang.Object
org.opensextant.giscore.events.Comment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, IGISObject, VisitableGeometry
Direct Known Subclasses:
WrappedObject
public class Comment extends Object implements IGISObject, Serializable
Represents a Comment object. In XML would be represented as <!-- text content -->.
Author:
Jason Mathews, MITRE Corp. Created: Mar 10, 2009 9:03:48 AM
